name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Cook bacon in a pan until crispy, then add minced garlic.
Drain spaghetti and add it to the pan with bacon and garlic.
Remove from heat, add the egg and cheese mixture, and toss quickly to coat the spaghetti.
Season with black pepper and salt to taste.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the marinated chicken until browned.
Remove chicken and sauté chopped onions in the same pan.
Add tomato puree, spices, and cook until the mixture thickens.
Add the chicken back to the pan and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
Let cool before serving.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa to serve
steps: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Add onions and garlic, cook until softened.
Stir in taco seasoning and 50ml water, simmer until thickened.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill each taco shell with beef mixture.
Top with cheese, lettuce, tomato, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, and snow peas.
Cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Toss vegetables to coat evenly and cook for 2 more minutes.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion in a large bowl.
Add feta cheese and black olives.
In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Serve fresh.

name: Shakshuka
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and bell pepper, cook until softened.
Add garlic, paprika, and cumin, cook for 1 minute.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Make 4 small wells in the sauce and crack an egg into each.
Cover skillet and cook until eggs are set to your liking.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley, and serve with bread.

name: Teriyaki Salmon
ingredients: Sesame seeds and chopped green onions for garnish
steps: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, honey, mirin, ginger, and garlic to make the teriyaki sauce.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Place salmon fillets skin-side down and cook for 3–4 minutes.
Flip salmon and pour in the teriyaki sauce.
Cook for another 3–4 minutes, spooning sauce over salmon until glazed and cooked through.
Remove from heat, drizzle with sesame oil.
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions, serve with rice or steamed vegetables.
